extendedInfo.description: Easy Learning of Mathematical Numbers for young ones. Targeted for ages 0 - 3 Years.Features :- Big Numbers.- Number Sound in Kids Voice to make is more interactive for kids.- Big pictures and big Icons- Easy to Use.- Sliding Flash Cards.- Fun application for Kids.Tested in Samsung Galaxy at the time of development version 2.1 or later supported.Any suggestions or improvements are welcome ! We will try to have them added for you. Suggestions can be sent to support@decrux.com.Keywords : Number learning, toddler Maths numbers, 123 flash cards, Easy to use number flash cards.

reviews.title: Great for learning
reviews.comment: Teaching my 3yr old with this. If you don\'t want ads untick your data package whilst they play. Also if you dislike the way it\'s said turn volume if you& sit with this your child to pronounce for them
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Great for teaching grandkids association of quantity and number.  Can use settings to silent the voice so as not to give away the answer.
reviews.author: Susan Luker

reviews.title: Olga
reviews.comment: Stupid app.!   No colors. My daughter got bored the same second she looked at it.  Uninstalling IMMEDIATELY!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I hate the ads that are flashing below,my kid gets distracted to it,otherwise was a very good approach
reviews.author: Richa Bhuwania Doshi

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I can use it everywhere to make my little one busy.
reviews.author: Milagros Arcia

reviews.title: Wonderful application
reviews.comment: My kid loves it a lot.  Now he knows his basic counting.
reviews.author: A Google User
